any business that has a website or an

I've got a link here to uh built with
and basically according to the data on
that website there are over 28 million
live sites today that use Google
Analytics and historically counting the
live sites there's over 77 million sites
that have used it So there are a lot of

think it'd be hard for anyone to come up
with a solution that's been used on more
websites over time Also if you're just
getting started off it's free Up to a
million events per day can be tracked
and sent to BigQuery where you can then
do more data analysis with those Um and
the only cost to you is the BigQuery
compute and storage costs at that
